Text:
Talk about worthless zip-job!

All the individual rar files are actually zipped.

So tfash1.r00 for instance is zipped as tfash1.zip. Its the same for all the other files.

@TempDude29
Stun provide things 'AS IS'.
Many scene groups doing that. (rar rar rar zip zip zip...)
So it's a good sign of not altered or affected.
It's a shame if you don't ask when you don't know.

If you reread perhaps you'll notice I didnt specifically point out the finger to the uploader mmkay?

This is the first game I've seen with this annoying double-rar/zip system and I hope I'll never have to see another one. Trust me, I'm not alone in hoping that.
